plot outline: A Dalit youngster wants to bring about social reform in his hamlet. Meanwhile, there's the landlord of the village who partakes in being an active member of the sand mafia by the river bank. And then there's a young couple seeking refuge here, where the woman catches the fancy of the village Casanova.
title: Maarikondavaru
plot: A Dalit youngster wants to bring about social reform in his hamlet. Meanwhile, there's the landlord of the village who partakes in being an active member of the sand mafia by the river bank. And then there's a young couple seeking refuge here, where the woman catches the fancy of the village Casanova.::sukanya suresh
